本当は崩壊生物で実戦の演習をするつもりだったんだけど、喜ぶべきことにここ一帯の崩壊生物はすっかり姿を消しちゃったのよね。

じゃあ、演習を始めるわよ。安心して、弾は訓練用のものと交換してあるから。でも命の危険はないとはいえ、命中したらそれなりに痛いわよ……。

기갑 병기의 전투 능력과 전투 데이터 테스트니까, 이 녀석들의 강도는 최고 수준으로 조정해 뒀어. 그러니까, 실전보다 쉽다고 생각하지는 말아 줘. 각별히 방심하지 않도록…….
In order to test the combat ability and combat data of the mecha weapon I will turn up their intensity to the maximum, which is not easier than the actual battle, so please do not let up.

It's a test of combat capability and combat data for armored weapons, so the strength of these guys is adjusted to the highest level. So don't ever think it's easier than a real battle. Don't let your guard down. ......

1160: That's it for today. Thanks for helping. I've got some precious data.

That's enough for today. Thanks for your hard work. You've given me some valuable data.

The newly made mecha weapons seem to have no problems in terms of combat performance...well, it's not surprising that they are produced by the same index after all.

자, 다음 목표는 생산 능력을 향상시키는 거네…….
Then the next task is still to optimize the capacity ......
Okay, so the next goal is to increase production capacity. ......
"Alert! Alert! Overheat alert! Self-explosion program activated according to Protocol 42... Three..."
「警报！警报！机体过热即将瘫痪！依据42号协议启动自爆程序…3…」
「警報！警報！機体がオーバーヒート、まもなくダウンします！42番プロトコルに従って自爆プログラム起動……3……」
「경고! 경고! 기체가 오버히트, 곧 다운됩니다! 42번 프로토콜에 따라 자폭 프로그램 가동……3……」
"Alert! Warning! The fuselage is overheating and will soon be paralyzed! Initiating self-destruct sequence in accordance with protocol 42...3..."
Alarm! Alarm! The aircraft is overheating and will be down shortly!
What!! Wait a minute! Why is there self-explosion program? Hey! Run!
哇！！等等！怎么还有自爆程序！喂！快跑！
わっ！！待って、なんで自爆プログラムなんて搭載してるの！？ちょっと、早く逃げて！
왓!! 잠깐, 왜 자폭 프로그램 같은 걸 탑재하고 있는 거야!? 자, 빨리 도망쳐!
WOW!!! Wait! Why is there a self-destruct program! Hey! Run!
Whoa! Wait, why is there a self-destruct program on board! Hey, get out of here!
Alright... I have some other important jobs to do. It's necessary to delete this dangerous protocol for good.
嗯…好吧，看来还有更重要的事情要做，有必要把这个危险的协议给永久删除。
うん……わかってるからそんな目で見ないで……どうやらもっと重要なことがあるわね。こんな危険なプログラムは永久に削除する必要があるわ。
응…… 알고 있으니까 그런 눈으로 보지 마…… 어떻게 보니 더 중요한 게 있네. 이런 위험한 프로그램은 영구히 삭제해야 해.
Hmmm...well, it seems there are more important things to do and it is necessary to remove this dangerous protocol permanently.
Yeah ...... I know, so don't look at me like that ...... apparently we have more important things to do. This dangerous program needs to be permanently removed.
I thought I would have an army of powerful mecha protecting me 24/7, but it turns out that I will putting a chain of bombs on my waist.
本来想着总算有大批强力的机甲可以时刻保护我了…没想到居然是把一堆炸弹放在了自己身边。
強力な機甲が大量にあればもっと安全になるかと思ったけど……まさか大量の爆弾を置こうとしていたなんて。
강력한 기갑이 대량으로 있으면 더 안전해질 줄 알았지만…… 설마 대량의 폭탄을 놓으려고 했던 거야.
I thought I would have a large number of powerful mechs to protect me at all times...but I didn't expect to have a bunch of bombs placed around me.
I thought a large amount of powerful armor would make it safer. ...... I had no idea they were trying to place a large number of bombs.
Sigh.... My passion about work plunges...
哎…工作热情顿时就小了很多……
はぁ……頑張ってテストしたのに、このやり場のない虚無感はどこにぶつけたらいいのだろう。
하아…… 열심히 테스트했는데, 이 답답한 허무감은 어디에 털어놓아야 할까.
Hey ... work enthusiasm suddenly a lot smaller ......
Huh. ...... I did my best to test it, but where can I put this feeling of emptiness that I can't do anything about?

This should be about right, I didn't expect there to be so many dangerous procedures in addition to the self-destruct protocol... I really don't know what the engineers in the ME community who make mechs think.

msg
But everything is fine now. Those little tricks are not big of a deal. Having every protocol that triggers self-explosion fixed, these mecha are now my reliable bodyguards.
哼哼…不过已经没有问题了，对于这些小伎俩我还是可以应付的，我已经修正了所有会引起自爆的协议，这样这些机甲就是最安全的保镖了~
フフン……でも、もう大丈夫。このくらいの小細工なら簡単に書き換えできるわ。自爆を引き起こすプログラムは全部修正したし、これで安全な用心棒の完成。
흐흠…… 하지만 이제 괜찮아. 이 정도 작은 수작은 간단히 다시 쓸 수 있으니까. 자폭을 일으키는 프로그램은 전부 수정했고, 이제 안전한 경호원 완성이네.
Hmph... but there's no problem anymore, I can still handle these tricks, I've fixed all the protocols that will cause self-destruct, so these mechs are the safest bodyguards~
Hmph ...... but you're all set. I can easily rewrite this little trick. I've fixed all the programs that cause self-destructs, and now we have a safe bouncer.
msg
Thanks to you, I am able to discover the serious loophole. I can't imagine those mecha explode in the middle of battle field...
多亏了你这次的测试让我找到了最严重的漏洞，如果不是你的话，这些机甲在战场上自爆的画面我简直无法想象……
